attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it ruined my phone. MY PHONE STARTED SCREAMING AT ME! I DIDN'T KNOW IT COULD DO THAT! BUT IT DID AND THE NOISE KILLED MY PET WORM! I HOPE YOU ARE HAPPY WITH YOURSELF
attributes.title: What are you thinking

attributes.review: So I first downloaded this app as a joke but then I saw that as soon as it finishes installing all of my games turn into oranges and shake almost seizure like. I didn't know what to do so I took it to the Apple store and I got the manager to look at my phone. The manager suddenly screamed and threw my phone out the window, seconds later my phone exploded into pieces. I then bought a new phone and didn't download the app this time. Learn from your mistakes
attributes.title: OMG 😳

attributes.review:
I am not a part of whatever gen z thing that is going on but this app honestly ruined my life...
I downloaded it to get access to all of my MAGA desires but I found that the app was terrible for that!! It’s very glitchy, very slow, and very confusing to navigate(I also personally have heard that it’s stealing our data...yikes). I feel emotions such as upset and disappointment. My phone is now totally crashing whenever I interact with the app and my other apps seem to be deteriorating as well.  

Sincerely, 
Disappointed
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!

attributes.review: I am a longtime trump supporter but now I will be sitting out of the election. I put in my email a few hours later my email has been hacked! It’s flooded with pornography and my devices hardly work. Donald Trump either sold my information or doesn’t have ANY encryption on his app. I emailed many times and they all tried to say it was my fault. You lost a voter Trump.
attributes.title: I am disgusted

attributes.review: This app is completely garbage I opened it once to try it and I wanted to die I also am now considered a vegetable due to the amount of brain cells I lost please delete.
attributes.title: Bring back Obama💫
